## âœ… Checklist

Before submitting the PR, please ensure:

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (refer to [CODE_STYLE.md](../docs/CODE_STYLE.md))
- [ ] I have performed self-code review
- [ ] I have added comments, especially for complex logic
- [ ] My changes do not produce new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests to prove my fix or feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests all pass (`go test ./...`)
- [ ] Code has been formatted (`go fmt ./...`)
- [ ] Code has passed lint checks (`go vet ./...` or `golangci-lint run`)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (README.md, CONTRIBUTING.md, etc.)
- [ ] My commit message follows the [commit convention](../CONTRIBUTING.md#commit-convention)
- [ ] I have checked all changed files to ensure no sensitive information is leaked
